name: githyanki-knight-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of githyanki-knight-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, cosmic surrealism, impossible geometries, starfield grain, indigo glows, palette: indigos, violets, black, cold silver, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of githyanki-knight-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a masterpiece of a heroic tabletop fantasy scenario that leans towards D&D 5th Edition. The scene should be grounded in the materials of a medieval-fantasy universe, showcasing culturally coherent gear and devoid of modern technology or signs. The style to pursue is a consistent, painterly collection style depicting the knight-like character that belongs to the mythological githyanki species. The anatomy of the figure should highlight its unique musculature and limbs, with a human silhouette for comparison. The scene is set in a fantastical environment where underwater meets the sky, portraying movement. The color palette primarily employs shades of indigo, violet, black, and cold silver. Capture an essence of cosmic surrealism, implementing impossible geometries and a grainy starfield. Ensure the depiction seems like a detailed concept art, excluding any embedded text or symbols unless meaningful, and also avoid modern signage, photo-real CGI, anime style, bloom glare. The required aspect and resolution should be respected for the highest quality.
